definition: must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
have no choice or option but to/cannot but/have to/can't help it/can't avoid
to hate to do sth/to hate to part with/to begrudge
to act against one's will/to have no alternative but to/to have to/to have no choice/must
wishing one could do sth/to hate to be unable/itching to do sth
lit. not to know whether to laugh or cry (idiom)/both funny and extremely embarrassing/between laughter and tears
to have no alternative (idiom); compelled by circumstances/forced into sth
unable to change sth/unable to deal with
see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]
pinyin: bai3 si1 bu4 de2 qi2 jie3

definition: to have no other choice/to be the last resort
pinyin: bu4 de2 yi3 er2 wei2 zhi1

definition: only when absolutely essential (idiom); as a last resort
not to enjoy popular support/to be unpopular

sentences.english: Mr Thant, however, skirts three difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有三个问题吴丹敏处理不得当。

sentences.english: No junketing activity would be conducted on official expenses without permission of the company.
sentences.chinese: 在未得到公司授权情况下，不得以公费进行宴请活动。

sentences.english: If the teacher is a lamp, I'm reluctant to burning wick.
sentences.chinese: 如果老师是一盏灯，我就是舍不得燃烧的灯芯。

sentences.english: Keeping our military and using them when we have to, but not as our first instrument.
sentences.chinese: 保存军事力量，不到非不得已绝不轻易动武。

sentences.english: It must not express that the drawee will perform his promise by any other means than the payment of money.
sentences.chinese: 不得书明付款人将用付款以外之方法履行承诺。

sentences.english: It is not clear how many survived the collapse of the three-storey building.
sentences.chinese: 倒塌的三层楼下还有多少幸存者目前还不得而知。

sentences.english: This politician has done a lot of shameful things.
sentences.chinese: 这个政客做了很多见不得人的事。

sentences.english: Children under 18 are not admitted to this film.
sentences.chinese: 未满18岁的小孩不得入场看这部电影。

sentences.english: Such documents that are issued by the carrier shall not be negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 承运人签发的此类单证不得转让。

sentences.english: Those children are always chasing about, making a terrible noise.
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子总是追来追去，吵得不得了。

sentences.english: Article 66 The trustee of a public trust must not resign without the approval of the regulatory agency of public undertakings.
sentences.chinese: 信托的受托人未经公益事业管理机构批准，不得辞任。

sentences.english: SECCO property and supplies may not be used for personal use.
sentences.chinese: 赛科的财产与所提供的一切不得为个人所用。

sentences.english: We declare him anathematized and excommunicated and we judge him condemned to eternal fire.
sentences.chinese: 我们宣告他被诅咒及驱逐出教，并断定他不得永生。

sentences.english: You are not allowed to use invisibility skill in the family battlefields .
sentences.chinese: 您不得使用隐形技术在家庭战场。

sentences.english: Standing there in the office, miserable, I wanted to vanish into the paneling.
sentences.chinese: 我伤心地站在办公室门口，恨不得消失在门缝里。

sentences.english: This in turn blighted his middle years.
sentences.chinese: 这最终使他在中年郁郁不得志。

definition: not having undergone/without (having gone though a certain process)
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
